Html:
Hello, I'm a newbie to .net, do I need to register PowerCollections.dll using regsvr32 to be able to use this collection? Please advise on install procedure. Thanks.

Gi

No...

The zip file contains
\PowerCollections\Binaries\PowerCollections.dll

You simply go to your .Net project..do a "Add Reference", and browse to this file. Then click "Add".

Now you can use it. It will (most likely) be copied to your /bin/Debug/ folder when you build your application.

Good luck.
